title: Which champion has Tiger Udyr's damage, CC of Vi, tankiness of Jarvan, and sustain of Mundo?
body:
...and is more easier to play than Garen, has the burst of Zed, and an extremely short gap closer that also slows you, and above all a Gragas ult that hits twice as hard and gives you insane resistances...

{{champion:5}} mid.

Edit: AD you fuckers, AP Xin zhao is bad
